## FlyoutNavigationPolicy class

Generic navigation policy that navigates between items in the flyout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FlyoutNavigationPolicy<T> implements INavigationPolicy<T> 
```
**Implements:** [INavigationPolicy](./blockly.inavigationpolicy_interface.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getFirstChild(\_current)](./blockly.flyoutnavigationpolicy_class.getfirstchild_1_method.md) |  | Returns null to prevent navigating into flyout items. |
|  [getNextSibling(current)](./blockly.flyoutnavigationpolicy_class.getnextsibling_1_method.md) |  | Returns the next item in the flyout relative to the given item. |
|  [getParent(current)](./blockly.flyoutnavigationpolicy_class.getparent_1_method.md) |  | Returns the parent of the given flyout item. |
|  [getPreviousSibling(current)](./blockly.flyoutnavigationpolicy_class.getprevioussibling_1_method.md) |  | Returns the previous item in the flyout relative to the given item. |
|  [isApplicable(current)](./blockly.flyoutnavigationpolicy_class.isapplicable_1_method.md) |  | Returns whether the given object can be navigated from by this policy. |
|  [isNavigable(current)](./blockly.flyoutnavigationpolicy_class.isnavigable_1_method.md) |  | Returns whether or not the given flyout item can be navigated to. |
